author: Andrew J. Hawkins
title: There’s no better time for cities to take space away from cars
description: Cities should take space away from cars by closing streets to traffic and removing parking for protected bike lanes in response to the coronavirus. These radical measures can help promote social distancing and healthy living beyond the pandemic.
content:
Closing certain streets to car traffic can help promote social distancing during the coronavirus pandemic
Photo by ANGELA WEISS/AFP via Getty Images
